name: Leaping SHMUP (Prototype)
description:
Made for Game Off 2019, theme: Leaps and Bound

The game is a SHMUP with leaping mechanics.  The character is a magical girl fighting an invasion of alien cats - the character only shoots every time it leaps. 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to shoot
  • Esc to pause

I wish I could do more - but I was surprisingly busy last month, so I could only make this much. There are still some more that I want to put into this game, but time has run out.

Have fun! Careful not to let the boss bite your head
